caseTitle: Ali Azhar Khan Baloch v. Province of Sindh and others
tagline: Any appointment by transfer under Rule 9(1) of Sindh Civil Servants (Appointment, Promotion and Transfer) Rules, 1974, has to be for a fixed term, and, on completion of such term, the civil servant has to join back his parent department. The concept of absorption of a civil servant and/or government servant is foreign to the Sindh Civil Servants Act, 1973, as well as Rule 9(1) of the Sindh Civil Servants (Appointment, Promotion and Transfer) Rules, 1974. The said rule does not permit transfer of non-civil servant to a non-cadre post or to a cadre post.
